messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Hey, I‚Äôve been struggling with ED for a while. Need help.

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: Hi Swarit! I‚Äôm Ruby. So sorry to hear that. Let‚Äôs get you the right support. Can you share a bit more about your symptoms?

messages.author: Swarit

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: Got it. Dr. Warren will review your case. Meanwhile, I‚Äôll share an initial exercise plan to boost circulation. Ready to start?

messages.text: Sure, but I‚Äôm not very active. Can it be simple?

messages.text: Of course! Rachel, our physiotherapist, will tailor it. Let me connect you.

messages.author: Rachel
messages.text: Hi Swarit! Start with 10-min daily walks. Build up slowly. Let‚Äôs chat more tomorrow?

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Sounds doable. Thanks!

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: Great! Dr. Warren will call you tomorrow at 10 AM. Any questions before then?

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Nope. Just‚Ä¶ thanks for moving fast.

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: You‚Äôre welcome! Let‚Äôs tackle this together. üôå

messages.author: Dr. Warren
messages.text: Swarit, I‚Äôll review your history. Meanwhile, avoid alcohol before bed. It affects performance.

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Already cut down. Will try zero.

messages.author: Dr. Warren
messages.text: Good. Let‚Äôs schedule a full diagnostic in October. For now, focus on the plan.

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Okay. Will keep you posted.

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: Perfect! Carla, our nutritionist, will check in soon about diet tips. Stay strong!

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Hey Ruby, I tried the exercise routine yesterday but felt really tired afterward. Is this normal?

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: No problem! I‚Äôll save the details for when you‚Äôre ready. Let me know if you need anything else.

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Will do. Thanks!

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Hey Ruby, I‚Äôve been feeling really down lately. The ED is getting worse and I don‚Äôt know what to do.

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: I understand your hesitation, but stress can definitely play a role. Dr. Warren can help us rule out other factors too. Would you be open to a quick chat with him?

messages.author: Ruby

messages.text: No problem! I‚Äôll also check in with Carla to see if there are any dietary adjustments that might help. Sometimes small changes can make a big difference.

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: That sounds good. I‚Äôve been eating a lot of processed food lately. Maybe that‚Äôs part of the problem.

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: It very well could be. I‚Äôll have Carla reach out to you with some suggestions. In the meantime, try to cut back on processed foods and increase your water intake.

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Will do. Thanks for your help, Ruby.

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: You‚Äôre welcome, Swarit. Remember, we‚Äôre here for you. Let‚Äôs tackle this together. üôå

messages.author: Dr. Warren
messages.text: Hi Swarit, this is Dr. Warren. Ruby mentioned you‚Äôve been experiencing worsening ED. Let‚Äôs discuss this further tomorrow at 10 AM. Is that still convenient?

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Yes, 10 AM is fine. See you then.

messages.author: Swarit
messages.text: Thanks, Carla. Looking forward to it.

messages.author: Ruby
messages.text: Great! Let me know how the consultation with Dr. Warren goes. And Carla will follow up with you soon. üòä
